isApiEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"API\";\n}\nfunction isComponentEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"COMPONENT\";\n}\nfunction isDomainEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"DOMAIN\";\n}\nfunction isGroupEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"GROUP\";\n}\nfunction isLocationEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"LOCATION\";\n}\nfunction isResourceEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"RESOURCE\";\n}\nfunction isSystemEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"SYSTEM\";\n}\nfunction isUserEntity(entity) {\n  return entity.kind.toLocaleUpperCase(\"en-US\") === \"USER\";\n}\n\nexport { isApiEntity, isComponentEntity, isDomainEntity, isGroupEntity, isLocationEntity, isResourceEntity, isSystemEntity, isUserEntity };\n//# sourceMappingURL=conditions.esm.js.map\n","import React from 'react';\nimport { MissingAnnotationEmptyState } from '@backstage/core-components';\nimport { SkeletonPullRequestsListView, PullRequestsListView } from '../PullRequestsListView/PullRequestsListView.esm.js';\nimport { useGithubSearchPullRequest } from '../useGithubSearchPullRequest.esm.js';\nimport { isGithubTeamSlugSet, GITHUB_PULL_REQUESTS_TEAM_ANNOTATION } from '../../utils/isGithubSlugSet.esm.js';\nimport Alert from '@material-ui/lab/Alert';\nimport { isGroupEntity } from '@backstage/catalog-model';\nimport { useEntity } from '@backstage/plugin-catalog-react';\nimport { getHostname } from '../../utils/githubUtils.esm.js';\nimport { GitHubAuthorizationWrapper } from '@roadiehq/github-auth-utils-react';\n\nconst getPullRequestsQueryForGroup = (entity) => {\n  const githubTeamName = isGithubTeamSlugSet(entity);\n  return `is:open is:pr team-review-requested:${githubTeamName} archived:false`;\n};\nconst PullRequestsCard = () => {\n  const { entity } = useEntity();\n  const hostname = getHostname(entity);\n  const query = getPullRequestsQueryForGroup(entity);\n  const { loading, error, value } = useGithubSearchPullRequest(query, hostname);\n  if (loading) return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SkeletonPullRequestsListView, null);\n  if (error) return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Alert, { severity: \"error\" }, error.message);\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(PullRequestsListView, { data: value, emptyStateText: \"No requested reviews.\" });\n};\nconst Content = () => {\n  const { entity } = useEntity();\n  const hostname = getHostname(entity);\n  const githubTeamName = isGithubTeamSlugSet(entity);\n  if (!githubTeamName || githubTeamName === \"\") {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n      MissingAnnotationEmptyState,\n      {\n        annotation: GITHUB_PULL_REQUESTS_TEAM_ANNOTATION\n      }\n    );\n  }\n  if (!isGroupEntity(entity)) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Alert, { severity: \"error\" }, \"This card can only be used on Group Entities\");\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    GitHubAuthorizationWrapper,\n    {\n      title: \"GitHub Pull Requests Statistics\",\n      hostname\n    },\n    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(PullRequestsCard, null)\n  );\n};\n\nexport { Content, getPullRequestsQueryForGroup };\n//# sourceMappingURL=Content.esm.js.map\n","import { useApi } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\nimport { useAsync } from 'react-use';\nimport { githubPullRequestsApiRef } from '../api/GithubPullRequestsApi.esm.js';\nimport '@backstage/integration';\nimport '@octokit/rest';\nimport 'luxon';\n\nconst useGithubSearchPullRequest = (query, hostname) => {\n  const githubPrsApi = useApi(githubPullRequestsApiRef);\n  return useAsync(async () => {\n    return await githubPrsApi.searchPullRequest({ query, hostname });\n  }, [githubPrsApi]);\n};\n\nexport { useGithubSearchPullRequest };\n//# sourceMappingURL=useGithubSearchPullRequest.esm.js.map\n","import React from 'react';\nimport { makeStyles, Tooltip } from '@material-ui/core';\n\nconst useStyles = makeStyles(() => ({\n  open: {\n    fill: \"#22863a\",\n    verticalAlign: \"sub\"\n  },\n  closed: {\n    fill: \"#cb2431\",\n    verticalAlign: \"sub\"\n  },\n  merged: {\n    fill: \"#6f42c1\",\n    verticalAlign: \"sub\"\n  },\n  draft: {\n    fill: \"#6a737d\",\n    verticalAlign: \"sub\"\n  },\n  comment: {\n    fill: \"#768390\",\n    verticalAlign: \"sub\"\n  }\n}));\nconst StatusOpen = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"svg\", { width: \"16\", height: \"16\", className: classes.open, viewBox: \"0 0 16 16\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"path\",\n    {\n      fillRule: \"evenodd\",\n      d: \"M7.177 3.073L9.573.677A.25.25 0 0110 .854v4.792a.25.25 0 01-.427.177L7.177 3.427a.25.25 0 010-.354zM3.75 2.5a.75.75 0 100 1.5.75.75 0 000-1.5zm-2.25.75a2.25 2.25 0 113 2.122v5.256a2.251 2.251 0 11-1.5 0V5.372A2.25 2.25 0 011.5 3.25zM11 2.5h-1V4h1a1 1 0 011 1v5.628a2.251 2.251 0 101.5 0V5A2.5 2.5 0 0011 2.5zm1 React.createElement(\"svg\", { width: \"16\", height: \"16\", className: classes.closed, viewBox: \"0 0 16 16\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"path\",\n    {\n      fillRule: \"evenodd\",\n      d: \"M7.177 3.073L9.573.677A.25.25 0 0110 .854v4.792a.25.25 0 01-.427.177L7.177 3.427a.25.25 0 010-.354zM3.75 2.5a.75.75 0 100 1.5.75.75 0 000-1.5zm-2.25.75a2.25 2.25 0 113 2.122v5.256a2.251 2.251 0 11-1.5 0V5.372A2.25 2.25 0 011.5 3.25zM11 2.5h-1V4h1a1 1 0 011 1v5.628a2.251 2.251 0 101.5 0V5A2.5 2.5 0 0011 2.5zm1 10.25a.75.75 0 111.5 0 .75.75 0 01-1.5 0zM3.75 12a.75.75 0 100 1.5.75.75 0 000-1.5z\"\n    }\n  ));\n};\nconst StatusMerged = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"svg\", { width: \"16\", height: \"16\", className: classes.merged, viewBox: \"0 0 16 16\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"path\",\n    {\n      fillRule: \"evenodd\",\n      d: \"M5 3.254V3.25v.005a.75.75 0 110-.005v.004zm.45 0 100-1.5.75.75 0 000 1.5z\"\n    }\n  ));\n};\nconst StatusDraft = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"svg\", { width: \"16\", height: \"16\", className: classes.draft, viewBox: \"0 0 16 16\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"path\",\n    {\n      fillRule: \"evenodd\",\n      d: \"M7.177 3.073L9.573.677A.25.25 0 0110 .854v4.792a.25.25 0 01-.427.177L7.177 3.427a.25.25 0 010-.354zM3.75 2.5a.75.75 0 100 1.5.75.75 0 000-1.5zm-2.25.75a2.25 2.25 0 113 2.122v5.256a2.251 2.251 0 11-1.5 0V5.372A2.25 2.25 0 011.5 3.25zM11 2.5h-1V4h1a1 1 0 011 1v5.628a2.251 2.251 0 101.5 0V5A2.5 2.5 0 0011 2.5zm1 10.25a.75.75 0 111.5 0 .75.75 0 01-1.5 0zM3.75 12a.75.75 0 100 1.5.75.75 0 000-1.5z\"\n    }\n  ));\n};\nconst CommentIcon = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"svg\", { width: \"16\", height: \"16\", className: classes.comment, viewBox: \"0 0 16 16\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    \"path\",\n    {\n      fillRule: \"evenodd\",\n      d: \"M2.75 2.5a.25.25 0 00-.25.25v7.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h2a.75.75 0 01.75.75v2.19l2.72-2.72a.75.75 0 01.53-.22h4.5a.25.25 0 00.25-.25v-7.5a.25.25 0 00-.25-.25H2.75zM1 2.75C1 1.784 1.784 1 2.75 1h10.5c.966 0 1.75.784 1.75 1.75v7.5A1.75 1.75 0 0113.25 12H9.06l-2.573 2.573A1.457 1.457 0 014 13.543V12H2.75A1.75 1.75 0 011 10.25v-7.5z\"\n    }\n  ));\n};\nconst getStatusIconType = (row) => {\n  switch (true) {\n    case (row.state === \"open\" && row.draft):\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Tooltip, { title: \"Draft\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"span\", null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(StatusDraft, null)));\n    case row.state === \"open\":\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Tooltip, { title: \"Open\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"span\", null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(StatusOpen, null)));\n    case (row.state === \"closed\" && Boolean(row.merged)):\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Tooltip, { title: \"Merged\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"span\", null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(StatusMerged, null)));\n    case row.state === \"closed\":\n      return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Tooltip, { title: \"Closed\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\"span\", null, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(StatusClosed, null)));\n    default:\n      return null;\n  }\n};\n\nexport { CommentIcon, getStatusIconType };\n//# sourceMappingURL=Icons.esm.js.map\n","import { useApi, configApiRef } from '@backstage/core-plugin-api';\nimport { useAsync } from 'react-use';\nimport { githubPullRequestsApiRef } from '../api/GithubPullRequestsApi.esm.js';\nimport { readGithubIntegrationConfigs } from '@backstage/integration';\nimport '@octokit/rest';\nimport 'luxon';\n\nconst useGithubRepositoryData = (url) => {\n  const githubPullRequestsApi = useApi(githubPullRequestsApiRef);\n  const configApi = useApi(configApiRef);\n  const configs = readGithubIntegrationConfigs(\n    configApi.getOptionalConfigArray(\"integrations.github\") ?? []\n  );\n  const githubIntegrationConfig = configs.find(\n    (v) => v.apiBaseUrl && url.startsWith(v.apiBaseUrl)\n  );\n  const host = githubIntegrationConfig?.host;\n  return useAsync(async () => {\n    return githubPullRequestsApi.getRepositoryData({\n      url,\n      hostname: host\n    });\n  }, [githubPullRequestsApi, host]);\n};\n\nexport { useGithubRepositoryData };\n//# sourceMappingURL=useGithubRepositoryData.esm.js.map\n","import React from 'react';\nimport { Grid, Typography, Box, Link } from '@material-ui/core';\nimport { getStatusIconType, CommentIcon } from '../Icons.esm.js';\nimport { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles';\nimport { useGithubRepositoryData } from '../useGithubRepositoryData.esm.js';\nimport Alert from '@material-ui/lab/Alert';\nimport Skeleton from '@material-ui/lab/Skeleton';\n\nconst useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({\n  container: {\n    backgroundColor: theme.palette.background.default,\n    border: \"1px solid grey\",\n    borderRadius: \"6px\",\n    overflowY: \"auto\",\n    maxHeight: \"100%\"\n  },\n  pullRequestRow: {\n    paddingTop: \"0.5rem\",\n    paddingBottom: \"0.5rem\",\n    borderBottom: \"1px solid grey\",\n    \"&:hover\": {\n      backgroundColor: theme.palette.action.hover\n    },\n    \"&:last-child\": {\n      borderBottom: \"none\"\n    }\n  },\n  title: {\n    fontWeight: Number(theme.typography.fontWeightBold)\n  },\n  link: {\n    color: theme.palette.text.primary,\n    \"&:hover\": {\n      color: \"#539bf5\",\n      fill: \"#539bf5\"\n    },\n    \"&:first-child\": {\n      paddingRight: \"4px\"\n    }\n  },\n  secondaryText: {\n    color: theme.palette.text.secondary\n  },\n  middleColumn: {\n    paddingRight: \"0.5rem\",\n    paddingLeft: \"0.5rem\"\n  }\n}));\nconst SkeletonPullRequestItem = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { container: true, item: true, spacing: 0, className: classes.pullRequestRow, xs: 12 }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { item: true, xs: \"auto\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Skeleton,\n    {\n      variant: \"circle\",\n /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Skeleton, { variant: \"text\", width: 130 }))), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Grid,\n    {\n      item: true,\n      xs: 1,\n      style: { flexShrink: 0, marginLeft: \"auto\" },\n      className: classes.secondaryText\n    },\n    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Box, { display: \"flex\", justifyContent: \"flex-end\" }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n      Skeleton,\n      {\n        variant: \"circle\",\n        width: 18,\n        height: 18,\n        style: { marginTop: \"3px\" }\n      }\n    ))\n  ));\n};\nconst PullRequestItem = (props) => {\n  const { pr } = props;\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  const {\n    value: repoData,\n    error,\n    loading\n  } = useGithubRepositoryData(pr.repositoryUrl);\n  if (loading) return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SkeletonPullRequestItem, null);\n  if (error) return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Alert, { severity: \"error\" }, error.message);\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { container: true, item: true, spacing: 0, className: classes.pullRequestRow, xs: 12 }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { item: true, style: { paddingLeft: \"1rem\", flexShrink: 0 }, xs: \"auto\" }, getStatusIconType(pr)), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { item: true, xs: 10, className: classes.middleColumn }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Typography, { variant: \"body1\", noWrap: true, className: classes.title }, loading ? /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Skeleton, { variant: \"text\" }) : /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(React.Fragment, null, repoData ? /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Link,\n    {\n      className: `${classes.secondaryText} ${classes.link}`,\n      target: \"_blank\",\n      rel: \"noopener noreferrer\",\n      underline: \"none\",\n      href: repoData.htmlUrl\n    },\n    repoData.fullName\n  ) : /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(React.Fragment, null), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n    Link,\n    {\n      className: classes.link,\n      target: \"_blank\",\n      rel: \"noopener noreferrer\",\n      underline: \"none\",\n      href: pr.pullRequest.htmlUrl\n    },\n    pr.title\n  ))), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Typography, { variant: \"caption\", className: classes.secondaryText }, \"#\", pr.number, \" opened by\", \"    style: { flexShrink: 0, marginLeft: \"auto\" },\n      className: classes.secondaryText\n    },\n    /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { item: true }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n emptyStateText } = props;\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  if (!data || data.length < 1) {\n    return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(\n      Grid,\n      {\n        container: true,\n React.createElement(Grid, { item: true, md: 12 }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Typography, { className: classes.secondaryText, variant: \"h6\" }, emptyStateText))\n    );\n  }\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { container: true, className: classes.container, spacing: 1 }, data.map((pr) => /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(PullRequestItem, { pr, key: pr.id })));\n};\nconst SkeletonPullRequestsListView = () => {\n  const classes = useStyles();\n  return /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(Grid, { container: true, className: classes.container, spacing: 1 }, /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SkeletonPullRequestItem, null), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SkeletonPullRequestItem, null), /* @__PURE__ */ React.createElement(SkeletonPullRequestItem,
